page.title: 06RUISLIP EXHIBITIONS
page.content: The Winston Churchill Hall is owned by the G.L.C. and is the largest, most luxurious and expensive hall to hire in the area.It sometimes holds weddings and other large occasions such as the Ruislip and Northwood Festival of speech dance and drama. Hillingdon Borough hold concerts there. Keep fit and model exhibitions also take place. Sometimes our school (Whiteheath) goes there for either a concert or play. It has recently been used as a Disco hall.Some people have complained about the noise coming from the hall. There is an annual carnival organised by the Round Table who parade from the Orchard Hotel to the Winston Churchill Hall.
